features.featureDescription: Service supports disabling public network access either through using service-level IP ACL filtering rule (not NSG or Azure Firewall) or using a 'Disable Public Network Access' toggle switch.
features.featureGuidance: Disable Public Network Access' using either service-level IP ACL filtering rules or private endpoints or by setting the `publicNetworkAccess` property to disabled in ARM.
features.customerActionsDescription: Secure cloud native services with network controls

features.featureDescription: Service native IP filtering capability for filtering network traffic (not to be confused with NSG or Azure Firewall).
features.featureGuidance: If running containers on App Service which are stored in Azure Container Registry (ACR) ensure those images are pulled over a private network. Do this by configuring a private endpoint on the ACR storing those images in conjunction with setting the "WEBSITE_PULL_IMAGE_OVER_VNET" application setting on your web application.
